models.approvals: A request for human review and sign-off on agent-generated work or deliverables. Enforces the human-in-the-loop requirement before work goes out.
models.tasks: Individual action items that make up a work order. Represents the smallest unit of work that can be assigned and tracked.
models.blockers: Tasks or work orders flagged with blocking issues that prevent progress (missing info, waiting on someone, stuck).
models.upcomingDeadlines: Work orders with due dates in the next 7 days that need attention to stay on schedule.
models.activities: Recent actions and events in the system that track changes to work items, keeping users informed of what happened since they last logged in.
models.dailySummary: AI-generated overview from PM Copilot highlighting priorities and what needs to happen today.
models.metrics: Dashboard statistics showing tasks completed, approvals pending, and hours logged.

relationships: Each Approval references a Work Order or Deliverable that needs review
Each Task belongs to a Work Order and references its Project context
Blockers are Tasks or Work Orders with special 'blocked' status flags
Activities track recent changes to any work item (Projects, Work Orders, Tasks, Deliverables)
Upcoming Deadlines pull from Work Orders with due dates in the next 7 days

approvals.title: Website Redesign - Final Mockups
approvals.description: PM Copilot has compiled final mockups for the Acme Corp website redesign based on client feedback from previous rounds.

approvals.title: Q1 Marketing Campaign - Time Estimate
approvals.description: Analyst agent has estimated 80 hours for the Q1 marketing campaign work order based on historical data and scope.

approvals.description: Copywriter agent has drafted the monthly status report for the BuildRight Construction project.

approvals.title: API Integration Documentation
approvals.description: QA agent has completed testing and documentation for the API integration deliverable.

approvals.title: Client Proposal - E-commerce Platform
approvals.description: PM Copilot has drafted a proposal for the new e-commerce platform project based on client discovery call notes.

tasks.description: Compile and organize notes from initial client discovery session

dailySummary.summary: Good morning! You have 3 overdue items that need immediate attention, and 5 approvals waiting in your queue. The Website Redesign Phase 2 deadline is approaching in 3 days—consider reviewing those final mockups today. Two high-priority tasks (wireframe review and API testing) should be completed by end of day. Marcus's database migration is blocked and may need your input to unblock.
priorities: Review and approve website mockups (due tomorrow)
Complete overdue wireframe review with Acme Corp
Address database migration blocker with DevOps
dailySummary.suggestedFocus: Start with the overdue wireframe review—it's blocking Sarah's component library work. Then tackle the approval queue while you have momentum.
